body:
Fixes #1256, #1265
1. Added a method to get dependencies of particular types from Package
2. Fixed `info` command.
3. Consolidated code to read spec.yaml and database index.yaml into
   one method (`read_yaml_dep_specs()`) in spec.py.
4. Code understands old hash format, tuple format, and dicts for dep
   specs, for backward compatibility.
5. Spec YAML now uses a dict with keys to represent dep specs (this is
   more future-proof).
6. Dep specs no longer contain !!py-tuple entries in YAML (only lists
   properly YAML-ize)
7. bump database version.
title: Fix broken `spack info` command after build dep merge.
